ModMetaData.name: Slave Realism Improved
ModMetaData.author: Aunggrid
ModMetaData.description:
Divine harem mod with comprehensive slave management systems.
=== NEW FEATURES ===
1. FAITH & EDICTS SYSTEM • Generate Faith daily from slave devotion • Spend Faith on powerful colony-wide Edicts: - Bountiful Harvest: +40% plant work speed - Fervent Labor: +25% global work speed - Divine Fortification: +20% armor - Holy War: +35% melee damage, +15% speed
2. SPECIALIZATION ABILITIES Devoted slaves (Tier 3+) can specialize and gain active abilities: • Warrior: Challenger's Roar (taunt enemies) • Healer: Soothing Touch (instant heal) • Scholar: Moment of Insight (research boost) • Entertainer: Captivating Performance (AoE mood/recreation)
3. PALACE OF HIDRA (Rival Faction) • Tech-heavy faction led by the "High God King" • Notoriety system tracks your divine power usage • Hunter raids scale with your notoriety • Prove who is the REAL god!
4. ONE GOD RULE • Recruited pawns automatically become slaves • Only the God and slaves - no normal colonists • Quest pawns are exempted
=== CORE FEATURES === • Reincarnated God with Divine Abilities • Devotion system (Initiate → Faithful → Devoted → Zealot) • Divine Shield (slaves protect their master) • Resurrection ritual • Stockholm Syndrome and Protective Rage • Suppression Aura and Divine Healing
